TopicTitle: My take on the stock "Kerbal-X" rocket

Articles.Content:
I admit I did virtually nothing original with it, all I did was improve the craft's symmetry and trim down its part-count. But I think the result is what the stock Kerbal X included in the game should be.

https://kerbalx.com/Quixylvre/Kerbal-X
Might be useful for career mode. Although VSR seems to do better than stock parts.
